definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
pond/bathhouse pool/dance floor of a ballroom/(old) stalls (front rows in a theater)

sentences.english: In this paper, we propose a mathematical model of planar reflector on the Solar pond.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了太陽池反射板的數學模型，並進行了計算。

sentences.english: Consider that each resource pool has its own set of registered image templates.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮給每一個資源池指定自己的註冊圖像模板集。

sentences.english: Toilet and bidet, also with a place to change baby's diapers.
sentences.chinese: 衛生間和洗腳池，還有嬰兒的尿布臺。

sentences.english: Do not know because the Theis pool in Beichen that caused the contradiction and anlin.

sentences.english: The buffer pool hit ratio is now showing excellent results.
sentences.chinese: 現在的緩衝池命中率就顯示了較好的結果。

sentences.english: Consider a thread pool, where the tasks being executed are generally independent of each other.
sentences.chinese: 以線程池爲例，其中執行的任務通常相互獨立。

sentences.english: At the birthday party, Beichen and Brown.
sentences.chinese: 生日派對上，池北辰與布朗和好。

sentences.chinese: 接着，輸入池的名稱以及其它池參數。

sentences.english: The volume of detention ponding is obviously affected by design storm pattern.
sentences.chinese: 設計暴雨的雨型對雨洪調蓄池的容積計算有很大影響。

sentences.english: The emergency storage pit is also equipped with an agitator.
sentences.chinese: 事故漿液池也裝配有一個攪拌器。

sentences.english: Some people said the pool was so deep, it had no bottom.
sentences.chinese: 一些人說池如此深，它沒有了底部。

sentences.english: The savant foolishly took the school cooling pool because swimming pond.
sentences.chinese: 壆者愚蠢的把壆校的冷卻池當成游泳池。

sentences.english: Others were gathering a second expedition to the tide pools.
sentences.chinese: 另一些人聚攏在一起，準備再來一次潮汐池遠征。

sentences.english: Well, have you ever caught all the fish in the pond?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，你是否抓到池潭裏所有的魚呢？

sentences.english: The Fukushima Daiichi plant has seven pools dedicated to spent fuel rods.
sentences.chinese: 福島第一廠已致力於乏燃料棒的七個池。

definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
mouth of a spring or fountain
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
